StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMIRSExport]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT L.MEPS_NAME AS MEPSName, L.MEPS_CODE AS MEPSCode, CONVERT(VARCHAR(15), COALESCE(L.MEPS_IP_ADDRESS, E.MEPS_IP_ADDRESS)) AS MEPSIPAddress, COALESCE(L.MEPS_IPADDRESS_USER, E.MEPS_IPADDRESS_USER) AS UserLogin, COALESCE(L.MEPS_IPADDRESS_PWD, E.MEPS_IPADDRESS_PWD) AS [Password], E.EXPORTED_DATA AS MIRS4KRecord, E.TRANSACTION_ID AS Transac.onID, E.TRANSACTION_TYPE_ID AS Transac.onTypeID, S.SCHEDULE_ID AS ScheduleID FROM MIRS_EXPORT E INNER JOIN MEPS_SCHEDULE S ON E.SCHEDULE_ID = S.SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP L ON S.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = L.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE E.EXPORTED = 'N' AND --- EXPORTED_DATA IS NOT NULL AND COALESCE(E.SCHEDULE_ID, 0) != 0 AND COALESCE(E.PERSON_ID, 0) != 0 AND COALESCE(E.MEPS_IP_ADDRESS, '0.0.0.0') != '0.0.0.0' ORDER BY E.MEPS_IP_ADDRESS, E.TRANSACTION_ID
op.on (maxdop 1)
